wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Beadsworth (September 1876 – 9 October 1917) was an English professional football forward who played in the Football League for Burton United, Manchester United and Leicester Fosse.

response: On 9 October 1917 while Fighting in France during the First World War, former United player Arthur Beadsworth was killed while serving as a Sergeant in the Seventh Battalion of the Royal Leicestershire Regiment of the British Army.
